task.title: Add Scene & Source
task.shortdesc: To start recording, a Scene is to be added. There can be multiple Scenes which an agent can change and display while screen recording.

taskbody.context:
This section showcases the steps to add a scene on Windows.
OBS Studio starts with a blank scene by default. Agents can add all kinds of Sources to the Scenes â€” to show browser, Window screen capture, display capture, webcam, etc. Follow the below steps to add a scene and sources within.

step.cmd: At the bottom of the main window, click '+' icon in Scenes tab.

step.stepresult:
A list of different sources is displayed.Refer to the sections on, Window capture , and to configure further settings.
The screen capture functionality is not available on Linux.
For macOS screen capture source, refer to the link:
